situation.title: Job loss - social situation
situation.meta_description: What to do if it happens.

content.processed:
The whole procedure of what to do was written by the Labour Office on their website.Â 

If you have returned from the EU/EEA/Switzerland where you terminated your employment, you can find information on what to do here.

We wish you good luck and just to be safe we remind you that here on this site you will also find information about possible compensations, benefits and also where to seek professional psychological help if necessary
